name: Cat-astrophe!
description:
Your cat ran out of your room. Upon exiting your room, you see something shocking - two cats that look just like yours! You must choose which cat is the real cat, or suffer the consequences!

Translation for cats:

"Meow meow meow meow meow. Meow meow, meow meow meow meow! Meow meow meow, meow meow meow meow!"
